name: df-limsup
body: |- wceq(clsp, cmpt(s0, universe, cinf(crn(cmpt(s1, cr, csup(cin(cima(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))), cxr, clt)))
comment: Define the superior limit of an infinite sequence of extended real numbers. Definition 12-4.1 of [Gleason] p. 175. See ~ limsupval for its value. (Contributed by NM, 26-Oct-2005.) (Revised by AV, 11-Sep-2020.)
